title: [ConEd]Power Platform/SPO discussion
description:
[ConEd]Power Platform/SPO discussion


Generated by Copilot. Be sure to check for accuracy.

Key Topics:

  • Power automate environment access: Azmi and Musthyala need to contact Elmer to resolve the permission issue for the environment they created for HLS. They are part of the security group but cannot see the environment. 1
  • Power automate approval process: Musthyala needs to test the workflow by moving the delay action outside of the do until loop to avoid sending reminder emails after approval. Frank and Betty suggested this change. 2
  • Copilot functionality: Frank shared some insights on how copilot can help programmers with code recommendations and extensibility. Azmi expressed interest in learning more about it. 3

Action Items:

  • Power automate export: Ask Elmer to export the solution and send it to Azmi. (Musthyala) 1
  • Power automate environment: Reply to the email and tell Elmer that Azmi is part of the security group but cannot see the environment. (Azmi) 2
  • Power automate approval process: Test the workflow with the delay outside of the reminder loop and see if it works. (Musthyala) 3
